title: Plaza de Toros La Macarena
text: Plaza de Toros La Macarena is a <a href="bullring">bullring</a> in <a href="Medell%C3%ADn">Medellín</a>, <a href="Colombia">Colombia</a>. It is currently used for <a href="bull%20fighting">bull fighting</a> and concerts. The stadium holds 15,000 spectators. It was opened in 1945.
